scheme_name: Panchayat Samiti Nandishala Jan Sahbhagita Yojana
details: The "Panchayat Samiti Nandishala Jan Sahbhagita Yojana" was initiated to provide shelter for stray male cattle by constructing infrastructure in Panchayat Samitis.
benefits: One-time assistance of 90% of the total construction cost.
eligibility: Eligible entities include local bodies, Panchayati Raj institutions, registered trusts, NGOs, and government-recognized institutions.
The organization must have been operational for at least 3 years.
Ownership of 20 bighas of private land to sustain 250 male cattle.
Minimum of 3 years of experience in operating a cattle shelter or similar activities.
Availability of 10% contribution towards the project cost.
application_process: Step 1: Obtain the application form from the Office of the District Joint Director, Animal Husbandry Department.
Step 2: Review the tender notices and apply online as per the guidelines.
Step 3: Submit the application form along with the required documents.
Step 4: Await verification and approval from the concerned authority.
documents_required: Proof of organization's registration and existence for at least 3 years.
Land ownership documents for 20 bighas of private land.
Experience certificate for operating a cattle shelter for at least 3 years.
Any additional documents as per scheme guidelines.
